author: Harry Fletcher
title: Coronation Street: Is there a shock pregnancy twist ahead for Sarah? - Coronation Street Soaps -
text: Things could be about to get complicated for Sarah Platt on Coronation Street, after it was revealed that she might be pregnant with Callum Logan's baby.Callum was killed by Kylie Platt during the live episode back in September, but his legacy on the cobbles could be set to continue, The Mirror reports. © ITV An ITV insider reportedly said: "It is a great twist by Corrie bosses. Sarah will be left with a heartbreaking dilemma about whether or not to keep evil Callum's baby."The decision threatens to tear the Platt family apart as they are already struggling to cope with keeping Callum's death a secret and now have this bombshell."The aftermath of Callum's death will continue to dominate Coronation Street for the next few months following the jaw-dropping live episode. © ITV Coronation Street continues tomorrow (October 16) at 7.30pm on ITV.Coronation Street Live: Rewatch the moment that Kylie killed CallumCoronation Street's Paula Lane: 'The Platts will turn on each other after Callum's deathRead more Coronation Street spoilers and newsDigital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on more Gloved Hand Killer deaths in Hollyoaks, the reveal of Robert Sugden's shooter in Emmerdale, a drastic decision from Kathy Beale in EastEnders and Alya Nazir's guilt spiralling out of control in Coronation Street. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID);
